mage.Name: mage
mage.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in using magic to cast long and short range spells in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

warrior.Name: warrior
warrior.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in using physical strength and melee combat in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

rogue.Name: rogue
rogue.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in stealth, agility, and dexterity in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

druid.Name: druid
druid.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in nature magic and healing in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

paladin.Name: paladin
paladin.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in holy magic and melee combat in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

necromancer.Name: necromancer
necromancer.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in dark magic and summoning undead creatures in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

bard.Name: bard
bard.Description: This class is the primary class that specializes in music, charm, and support magic in battle with 3 split classes to choose from

drunkenmaster.Name: drunkenmaster
drunkenmaster.Description: This class is a split class of the rogue that specializes in unpredictable and erratic fighting styles, using agility and dexterity to outmaneuver opponents
